original_text:
Have you not asked those who travel the roads,
    and do you not accept their testimony
korean_text: 너희가 길 가는 사람들에게 묻지 아니하였느냐 그들의 증거를 알지 못하느냐

sentences.original_text: Have you not asked those who travel the roads
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 길 가는 자들에게 묻지 않았느냐

sentences.original_text: and do you not accept their testimony
